snippet: Leon E. Panetta, the United States defense secretary, says President Mohamed Morsi is “his own man,” the most positive endorsement so far from a member of the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: Leon E. Panetta, the United States defense secretary, says President Mohamed Morsi is “his own man,” the most positive endorsement so far from a member of the Obama administration.

headline.seo: In Egypt, Panetta Declares Support for Morsi
headline.main: In Cairo, Panetta Declares Support for Egypt’s New President
headline.print_headline: In Cairo, Panetta Declares Support for Egypt’s New President
